definition: common/general/to share/together/total/altogether/abbr. for 共產黨|共产党[Gong4 chan3 dang3], Communist party
human excrement/night soil (human manure traditionally used as agricultural fertilizer)
to talk crap/to be full of shit
to look upon as dirt/considered worthless
to turn over manure/fig. to offend others by endlessly repeating unpleasant remarks
to taste a patient's excrement (a form of medical examination, seen as an act of loyalty or filial piety)/to suck up to sb/to kiss ass

sentences.english: A tiny ball of bat guano and sulfur.
sentences.chinese: 一个蝙蝠粪和硫磺小球。

sentences.english: Fouling of street by dog faeces.
The proceeds from the coffee sales will go to charity.
sentences.chinese: “猫粪”咖啡的销售收入将捐给慈善机构。

sentences.english: And it just goes to show how useful coprolites can be.
sentences.chinese: 这正显示粪化石有多么大的用途。

sentences.english: Dung beetles belong to the family Scarabaeidae and are also known as scarabs.
sentences.chinese: 粪甲虫属于金龟子家族，与圣甲虫一样有名。

sentences.english: And I will cast abominations upon thee, and will disgrace thee, and will make an example of thee.
sentences.chinese: 我要将粪溺抛在你身上侮辱你，使你成为鉴戒。

sentences.english: For instance, fossilized dung, or "coprolites, " have revealed some dinosaurs ate grass.
sentences.chinese: 例如，腐化粪便，或“粪化石”揭示了些恐龙食草。

sentences.english: Objective To study the effects of using water-free toilet in the tunnel.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察免水冲生态厕所在防空洞中处理粪尿的效果。

sentences.english: On the second phase, the deodorization effect of wormcast was researched in the laboratory.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分为蚯蚓粪实验室除臭效果的研究。

sentences.english: Eliminates in the trachea the residual meconium.
sentences.chinese: 以清除气管内残留的胎粪。

sentences.english: The barn was filled with the sour-sweet smell of fresh dung.
sentences.chinese: 谷仓里弥漫着新粪酸甜的气味。

sentences.english: So-called muck, in today's society show incisively and vividly.
sentences.chinese: 所谓的粪，在今天的社会里表现得淋漓尽致。

sentences.english: What is the amniotic fluid and meconium aspiration syndrome?
sentences.chinese: 什么是羊水与胎粪吸入综合征？

sentences.english: And their combined reward will be no greater and no lesser than what will be won by a piece of dried turd.
sentences.chinese: 而他们总共的回报比一块烘干的粪赢来的不多不少。

sentences.english: They rushed about helter-skelter collecting dung and carrying earth.
sentences.chinese: 他们忙慌乱乱地跑来跑去拾粪担土。

sentences.english: I love the smell of bat guano in the morning.
sentences.chinese: 早上我比较喜欢蝙蝠粪的味道。

definition: human excrement/night soil (human manure traditionally used as agricultural fertilizer)
feces and urine/excreta/human or animal waste
to accumulate manure/to lay down compost
to turn over manure/fig. to offend others by endlessly repeating unpleasant remarks
